```{r include=FALSE}
require(mosaic)
require(knitr)
require(dplyr)
require(tidyr)

# For typesetting
library(xtable)
library(ggthemes)
baseTheme <- theme_tufte( ticks=TRUE )
library(xkcd)
funTheme <- theme_xkcd()
library(ScoreR)
opts_chunk$set( tidy=FALSE, out.width="50%", comment=NA,
                warning=FALSE)
options( width=60, 
         na.rm=TRUE,
         # Printing tables
         xtable.type="html",
         xtable.include.rownames=FALSE)
require(DCF)
```

<!-- Change this to add parameters for the scroller -->

```{r include=FALSE}
scroller_hook = function(before, options, envir) {
    if (before) {
        return('<div class="table-scroller300">')
    } else {
        return('</div>')
    }
}
knit_hooks$set( scroller=scroller_hook ) 
```
